vsphere_server.description: IP address of your vSphere server instance

vsphere_esxi_host.description: IP address of the ESXi host where vSphere is installed

vsphere_datacenter.description: Datacenter name on your vSphere server instance (i.e. Datacenter)

vsphere_datastore.description: Datastore name on your vSphere server instance (i.e. datastore1)

http_file_host.description: The IP address of where the files are served over HTTP for pfsense and ubuntu hosts

pfsense_iso.description: Path to the pfSense ISO, e.g. [ISOs] pfSense-CE-2.7.2-RELEASE-amd64.iso

ubuntu_iso.description: Path to the Ubuntu ISO, e.g. [ISOs] Linux/Ubuntu/ubuntu-22.04.3-live-server-amd64.iso

windows2016_iso.description: Path to the Windows 2016 ISO, e.g. [ISOs] Windows/Server 2016/Windows_Server_2016_Datacenter_EVAL_en-us_14393_refresh.ISO

windows2019_iso.description: Path to the Windows 2019 ISO, e.g. [ISOs] Windows/Server 2019/17763.3650.221105-1748.rs5_release_svc_refresh_SERVER_EVAL_x64FRE_en-us.iso
